name: Lightless Stories
description:
Three stories related to one another, filled with simplicity and secret meaning and definitely filled with obscureness, but not an evil one, does everything we are not familiar with have to be always scary?  It can be mysterious, of course, but something call to us like a gentle soothing breeze, by this time, we don't care if it's harmless or not. We are in.

(Press Esc for going back to the Main Menu and TAB  to reset the level you are currently on)

1# Nightime Texting - 1 button control: Press Space when the surroundings tell you so and wait until morning playing your GameBoy while hiding it from your relatives.

2# ...And They Were Gone - Full Keyboard: Survivors take turns to hide in a bush (Any Key the want). Then, the killer has to guess and select another key, with a 9 range key attack, and if any survivor is on that key, they will be eliminated. (3v1)

3# Midas' Nightmare - Mic Volume Control - wander around the Minos Labyrinth while the monster seeks you. It's dark, very dark, but the volume of your voice is your light.
